text: Katonda yye yooyo eyabatonda nga abaggya mu muntu omu, ng’ate mu ye mwe yaggya mukyalawe, abeere ng’adda gyali olw'okufuna obutebenkevu, bwe yamala okulabagana naye, naafuna olubuto olwangu, n’ayita nalwo mu mitendera (olubuto mweruyita) olw’amala okukula, baasaba Mukama omulabirizi waabwe, nebagamba nti, singa otuwa omwana omulongoofu, tujja kubeerera ddala mu beebaza
